title: Processing time has a spike
description: A Tomcat web server can take more or less time to respond to a request. This monitor tracks the average response time on different Tomcat hosts to identify instances that experience unusually long response times.

definition.name: [Tomcat] Anomalous max processing time for host {{host.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:tomcat.max_time{*} by {host}, 'agile', 2, direction='both', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
